Title: Batman: The Animated Series
Writer: Bill Finger, Bob Kane, Eric Radomski, Bruce Timm, Paul Dini
Actors: Kevin Conroy, Efrem Zimbalist Jr., Robert Hastings
Plot: The Dark Knight battles crime in Gotham City with occasional help from Robin and Batgirl.
Awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 3 wins & 19 nominations.
